Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near 35th-Bronzeville-IIT following an injured passenger.? Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near 35th-Bronzeville-IIT following an injured passenger.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
